block.p: Laura Vickers Chittick, the daughter of Dr. Marilyn Vickers and Dr. William Chittick, both of Athens, Ga., was married yesterday to Graham Laird Goodkin, the son of Helen and Michael Goodkin of Manhattan. The Rev. Martha Fulmer Smith performed the ceremony at St. James United Methodist Church in Athens.
The bride, 24, and the bridegroom, 25, graduated from Columbia University, where they met.

Laura Vickers Chittick, the daughter of Dr. Marilyn Vickers and Dr. William Chittick, both of Athens, Ga., was married yesterday to Graham Laird Goodkin, the son of Helen and Michael Goodkin of Manhattan. The Rev. Martha Fulmer Smith performed the ceremony at St. James United Methodist Church in Athens.
The bride, 24, and the bridegroom, 25, graduated from Columbia University, where they met.

Ms. Chittick, who is keeping her name, works in the Manhattan office of Credit Lyonnais, the French bank, where she is an institutional sales associate for stock options and other financial products. Her father is an associate professor of political science at the University of Georgia at Athens. Her mother is a clinical psychologist in private practice in Athens.

Mr. Goodkin is a financial analyst in the Norwalk, Conn., office of News America Marketing, the in-store advertising and coupon division of the News Corporation. His mother is the director of physical medicine and rehabilitation at the Parker Institute in New Hyde Park, Queens. His father is an independent marketing and business consultant in Manhattan.
